lenders.name: Sherry

lenders.name: Kelly

lenders.name: Kelly

lenders.occupational_info:
Although I'm a painter, I've made an effort to use my art as a tool to help those in need.  I do this by donating art or proceeds from my sales to non-profit or charitable organizations.  Now that I’ve discovered Kiva, thanks to President Clinton’s book “Giving”, I can help people further with the microloan system.

I hope to be part of this process for as long as I live.  

–Estefan Gargost

lenders.name: John Galt
lenders.loan_because: "The world you desire can be won, it exists, it is real, it is possible, it's yours. But to win it requires total dedication and a total break with the world of your past, with the doctrine that man is a sacrificial animal who exists for the pleasure of others. Fight for the value of your person. Fight for the virtue of your pride. Fight for the essence which is man, for his sovereign rational mind. Fight with the radiant certainty and the absolute rectitude of knowing that yours is the morality of life and yours is the battle for any achievement, any value, any grandeur, any goodness, any joy that has ever existed on this earth."
lenders.occupational_info: "Show me your achievement, and the knowledge will give me courage for mine."

lenders.loan_because:
I want to make a difference in the lives of families in countries that they have to struggle so much on a day-by-day basis. This gives me an opportunity to help improve the world, one little loan at a time.

**The Power of Attitude**
"Our lives are not determined by what happens to us, but by how we react to what happens; not by what life brings to us, but by the attitude we bring to life.  A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events, and outcomes.  It is a catalyst...a spark that creates extraordinary results."    Author Unknown....

My job is to edit them  - to make sure the translation is accurate. Most of these are related to testing to make sure that new drugs really work the way they're supposed to. Most of the time I edit documents translated from German to English, but sometimes I edit other languages as well.

A successful business helps all of the businesses associated with that business and ultimately the livelihoods of the owners, employees, and their families.

lenders.name: Moola for Miracles
lenders.loan_because:
Our Mission Statement:
"Actively supporting and strengthening women to achieve financial literacy and economic well-being through education, monetary support and friendship."
lenders.occupational_info:
Our Vision Statement:
"Women in need of support will become self-sufficient through financing of their micro enterprises, creating abundance and sustainability for themselves, their families and the communities in which they live."
Our Values are based on the writings of Angeles Arrien in her book 
 "The Four-Fold Way"
1. Show up and choose to be present.
2. Pay attention to what has heart and meaning
3. Tell the truth without blame or judgment. 
4. Open to outcome, not attached to outcome.

lenders.name: MUJEEB
lenders.loan_because: I want to open small business like a cafe to take care of my family. I have 2 kids & not working wife.
lenders.occupational_info: I need a rent a space & buy necessary equipment to start of my small business. I hope anybody will respond. Thank you.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations (NGOs) build their capacity by training/facilitation in fundraising, strategic planning and board development.

lenders.name: Onika
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe with a little bit of human generosity we can make a world of difference.  Its an obligation as a member of the human race to help in anyway that I can, even if it is just $25.

lenders.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Pete and Barb
lenders.loan_because: God is pleased.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because:
This is a very good idea: To help people help themselves.
Helen Keller said it so well: "I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish humble tasks as though they were great and noble. The world is moved along, not only by the mighty shoves of its heroes, but also by the aggregate of the tiny pushes of each honest worker."
lenders.occupational_info: I work with magazine publishers.

Kevin- sells cars to people.

lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for my life and believe every human being deserves the opportunity to live, love and grow.

lenders.name: Arely
lenders.occupational_info:
Los esfuerzos del RAM están dirigidos a lograr mejoras duraderas en la calidad de vida de los niños de escasos recursos del Cusco y del Perú, mediante un proceso que une el trabajo de personas de otras culturas y que le da significación en su vida, al:
 Permitir que los niños de escasos recursos del Cusco y sus familias satisfagan sus necesidades de alimentación / nutrición, educación, salud y aumentar sus capacidades para participar en su sociedad y beneficiarse de la misma.
 Promover el respeto de los derechos de los niños.
 Promover la comprensión, apoyo y unidad entre personas de diferentes países y culturas.

ESTRATEGIAS :

Se fundamentan en el crecimiento adecuado del niño, desarrollando las destrezas de los niños y sus familias, y que generan confianza en su propia capacidad, en su autodesarrollo, de tal manera que sean capaces de acceder a oportunidades que les permitan afrontar las dificultades y pobreza que se les presenta. 

PROGRAMAS :

 Alimentación / nutrición.
 Salud.
 Educación.
 Asistencia social.
 Proyección social.

PRINCIPIOS PROGRAMATICOS:

 De aprendizaje.
 De asistencia.
 De integración.
 De equidad de género.
 De empoderamiento.
 De Cooperación.
 De conservación y utilización adecuada de los recursos naturales.
 De comunicación intercultural.
 De respeto de los valores tradicionales.
 De amistad.
En este sentido, en torno a lo que referimos la proyección social, se ha considerado importante insertar y enseñar tanto a los niños como a sus fam,ilias en el aprendizaje y la implmentación de herramientas de trabajo que les permita tener estrategias de subsistencia, entre ellas esta la elaboración de diferentes productos tanto alimenticios chocolates, panaderia , como productos de uso: sandalias, chompas, Artesania, bisuteria , los que les permitan generarse a ellos mismos los niños y a sus familias otro ingreso que satisfaga todas las necesidades básicas que ellos por si mismos y por su condición dificil no pueden satisfacer. así mismo permitira generar un ingreso más al Centro, lo que contribuiria enormemente a poder atender a mayor cantidad de niños de bajos recursos.
el compromiso del Centro con la institución patrocinadora se da en los niveles:
- El Cariño, la lealtad y el agradecimiento de los niños y del Centro RAM.
-Todo producto elaborado por los niños y el Centro tendra una etiqueta donde se agradecra y publicitara la labor social del patrocinador respecto al centro y los niños.

Un mundo en el que los niños desarrollan su pleno potencial en nuestra sociedad, que respete sus derechos y su dignidad de personas
